00006 #include "maven.h"

00016 string dissectCode(MavenCompiler* c, string fullcode, StringList& types, MavenMutability& mut, bool warn) {
00017         fullcode = trim(fullcode);
00018         if(fullcode.length() == 0)
00019                 return "";
00020         
00021         // get preliminary word
00022         string prelim = "";
00023         for(int i = 0; i < fullcode.length(); ++i) {
00024                 if(!isalnum(fullcode[i]))
00025                         break;
00026                 else prelim += fullcode[i];
00027         }
00028         
00029         if(prelim == "return")
00030                 return "return " + dissectCode(c, fullcode.substr(7), types, mut, warn);
00031         
00032         if(prelim == "throw")
00033                 return "throw " + dissectCode(c, fullcode.substr(6), types, mut, warn);
00034         
00035         MavenDissectBlock db;
00036         vector<MavenDissectBlock> dbs;
00037         StringList ops;
00038         string temp = "", superfinal = "";
00039         ++c->dissectDepth;
00040         types.clear();
00041         
00042         // first we slice the entire code block
00043         StringList splitCode = splitCommas(fullcode);
00044         for(int a = 0; a < splitCode.length(); ++a) {
00045                 string code = trim(splitCode[a]);
00046                 int i = 0;
00047                 
00048                 // begin
00049                 while(i < code.length()) {
00050                         // prepare
00051                         db.reset();
00052                         
00053                         // forceCast
00054                         skipWhitespace(code, i);
00055                         if(code[i] == '(') {
00056                                 // attemp to read a forced type, otherwise rollback
00057                                 int old_i = i;
00058                                 ++i;
00059                                 for(; i < code.length(); ++i) {
00060                                         if(code[i] == ')') break;
00061                                         db.forceCast += code[i];
00062                                 }
00063                                 ++i;
00064                                 
00065                                 // a forceCast can only contain certain characters
00066                                 db.forceCast = trim(db.forceCast);
00067                                 for(int j = 0; j < db.forceCast.length(); ++j) {
00068                                         if(!isalnum(db.forceCast[j]) && db.forceCast[j] != '.' && db.forceCast[j] != '_') {
00069                                                 db.forceCast = "";
00070                                                 break;
00071                                         }
00072                                 }
00073                                 
00074                                 // check if its a valid type do rollback
00075                                 if(!isDataType(db.forceCast) && !objectExists(c, db.forceCast)) {
00076                                         db.forceCast = "";
00077                                         i = old_i;
00078                                 } else db.forceCast = findMavenObjectPath(c, db.forceCast);
00079                         }
00080                         
00081                         // characters are converted to their integer form
00082                         skipWhitespace(code, i);
00083                         if(code[i] == '\'') {
00084                                 string str = "";
00085                                 ++i;
00086                                 for(; code[i] != '\''; ++i)
00087                                         str += code[i];
00088                                 db.original = "'" + str + "'";
00089                                 ++i;
00090                         
00091                                 // we can stop here if all we have to dissect is a charcater
00092                                 if(i >= code.length() - 1) {
00093                                         dbs.push_back(db);
00094                                         //ops.push("");
00095                                         break;
00096                                 }
00097                         }
00098                         
00099                         // a String
00100                         if(code[i] == '"') {
00101                                 // or possibly a String
00102                                 string str = "";
00103                                 ++i;
00104                                 for(; i < code.length(); ++i) {
00105                                         if(code[i] == '"') break;
00106                                         else if(code[i] == '\\') {
00107                                                 str += string("\\") + code[i + 1];
00108                                                 ++i;
00109                                         } else str += code[i];
00110                                 }
00111                                 db.original = "\"" + str + "\"";
00112                                 ++i;
00113                         }
00114                         
00115                         // read the unary operator
00116                         if((i < code.length() - 1) && isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1)) && code[i] != '@') {
00117                                 // some operators are multiple characters, so read ahead
00118                                 for(; isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1)); ++i)
00119                                         db.unary += code[i];
00120                                 
00121                                 // if the unary operator is a '[' we have started a descriptive argument function call
00122                                 if(db.unary.length() > 0 && db.unary[0] == '[') {
00123                                         string descArgs = "";
00124                                         for(; i < code.length(); ++i) {
00125                                                 if(code[i] == ']') break;
00126                                                 descArgs += code[i];
00127                                         }
00128                                 }
00129                                 
00130                                 // validate unary operator
00131                                 if(!isUnaryOperator(db.unary)) {
00132                                         pushError(c, "Invalid unary operator '%s'", db.unary);
00133                                         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00134                                 }
00135                                 
00136                                 // if the unary operator is + or - its part of the bareword
00137                                 if(db.unary == "+" || db.unary == "-") {
00138                                         db.original += db.unary;
00139                                         db.unary = "";
00140                                 }
00141                         }
00142                         
00143                         // read the expression
00144                         skipWhitespace(code, i);
00145                         int countBrackets = 0, countSquare = 0;
00146                         for(; i < code.length(); ++i) {
00147                                      if(code[i] == '(') ++countBrackets;
00148                                 else if(code[i] == ')') --countBrackets;
00149                                 else if(code[i] == '[') ++countSquare;
00150                                 else if(code[i] == ']') --countSquare;
00151                                 else if(code[i] == '"') {
00152                                         db.original += code[i++];
00153                                         for(; i < code.length(); ++i) {
00154                                                 if(code[i] == '\\') {
00155                                                         db.original += code[i++];
00156                                                         db.original += code[i];
00157                                                 } else if(code[i] == '"')
00158                                                         break;
00159                                                 else db.original += code[i];
00160                                         }
00161                                 } else if(isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1)) && !countBrackets && !countSquare && code[i] != '@')
00162                                         break;
00163                                 db.original += code[i];
00164                         }
00165                         
00166                         // post unary operator
00167                         skipWhitespace(code, i);
00168                         if((i < code.length() - 1) && isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1))) {
00169                                 // some operators are multiple characters, so read ahead
00170                                 string unary = "";
00171                                 for(; isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1)); ++i)
00172                                         unary += code[i];
00173                                 
00174                                 // validate unary operator
00175                                 if(unary == "++" || unary == "--")
00176                                         db.postunary = unary;
00177                                 else i -= unary.length();
00178                         }
00179                         
00180                         // at this point there can only be an operator to join the next MavenDissectBlock
00181                         skipWhitespace(code, i);
00182                         if(i >= code.length() - 1 || isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1))) {
00183                                 // some operators are multiple characters, so read ahead
00184                                 string op = "";
00185                                 for(; i < code.length() && isOperatorPart(code.substr(i, 1)); ++i)
00186                                         op += code[i];
00187                                 op = trim(op);
00188                                 
00189                                 // make sure its a real operator
00190                                 if(op != "" && !isOperator(op)) {
00191                                         pushError(c, "Unknown operator '%s'", op);
00192                                         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00193                                 }
00194                                 
00195                                 // if this is the last operator on the statement (nothing after it)
00196                                 // lets try and move it to the unary
00197                                 if(i >= code.length() - 1 && op != "") {
00198                                         if(!isUnaryOperator(op)) {
00199                                                 pushError(c, "Invalid unary operator '%s'", op);
00200                                                 types.push(MAVEN_INVALID);
00201                                                 return MAVEN_INVALID;
00202                                         }
00203                                         db.unary = op;
00204                                 }
00205                                 
00206                                 // push the single onto the stack to deal with later
00207                                 db.trim();
00208                                 dbs.push_back(db);
00209                                 ops.push(op);
00210                         } else {
00211                                 pushError(c, "Operator expected after '%s' '%s'", code, code.substr(i, code.length() - i));
00212                                 types.push(MAVEN_INVALID);
00213                                 return MAVEN_INVALID;
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216                 
00217                 // bug #23: big problem?
00218                 if(dbs.size() == 0)
00219                         break;
00220                 
00221                 // make sure the number of operators matches the number of blocks
00222                 if(ops.length() < dbs.size())
00223                         ops.push("");
00224                 
00225                 // process each subparse and deal with the operators
00226                 dissectSubparse(c, dbs[0], ops[0], types, warn);
00227                 StringList types2;
00228                 types2.setTypes(dbs[0].types.join(","));
00229                 string final = dbs[0].processed;
00230                 for(int i = 1; i < dbs.size(); ++i) {
00231                         dissectSubparse(c, dbs[i], ops[i], types, warn);
00232                         string overloadedfunction = "";
00233                         types2.setTypes(validateOperator(c, ops[i - 1], types2.join(","),
00234                                                                                          dbs[i].types.join(","), overloadedfunction));
00235                         if(overloadedfunction != "")
00236                                 final += "->" + overloadedfunction + "(" + dbs[i].processed + ")";
00237                         else final += ops[i - 1] + " " + dbs[i].processed;
00238                 }
00239                 
00240                 // reset and append final
00241                 dbs.clear();
00242                 ops.clear();
00243                 
00244                 if(superfinal != "")
00245                         superfinal += ",";
00246                 superfinal += "(" + final + ")";
00247                 types.push(types2.join(","));
00248         }
00249         --c->dissectDepth;
00250         
00251         // all done
00252         return superfinal;
00253 }
